channel.title: Red cross on connections on Whonix gateway in task bar
channel.description:
Hi everybody. Quite new to whonix and still trying to install in on lubuntu machine and virtualbox. after installation and solved the key expired problems using command sudo faketime etc.... I have after whonix gateway reboot a red cross on the connections on whonix gateway. what does this means?
thanks!
Edit by Patrick: Changed title.

item.title: Red cross on connections on Whonix gateway in task bar
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Ah… In the task bar…

It’s an old issue.

The short answer is:
Just ignore it.

The long answer, details:
https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,532.0.html

Read full topic
item.source: Red cross on connections on Whonix gateway in task bar

item.title: Red cross on connections on Whonix gateway in task bar
item.dc:creator: jackmulligan
item.description:
http://postimg.org/image/v0dxtj7aj/

you can see on the connection icon a red cross. on the gateway and on the workstation. That happened after restarting for the first time the machines

Read full topic
